Exact Target MobilePush SDK - Android

Deprecated API

Contents
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
Deprecated Classes
com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.AnalyticActivity
          Instead of extending AnalyticActivity, you should use ETAnalytics directly. Override your Activity's Activity.onResume() and add the line ETAnalytics.engine().activityResumed(this);. You should also override Activity.onPause() and add the line ETAnalytics.engine().activityPaused(this);. 
 

Deprecated Fields
com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETPush.pushEnabled
          No longer used for managing push state. Now using a persistent store. Use ETPush.isPushEnabled() in conjunction with ETPush.enablePush(Activity) and ETPush.disablePush(Activity) instead. 
 

Deprecated Methods
com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETAnalytics.activityStarted(Activity)
          instead, call ETAnalytics.activityResumed(Activity) from your Activity's onResume() method. 
com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETAnalytics.activityStopped(Activity)
          instead, call ETAnalytics.activityPaused(Activity) from your Activity's onPause() method. 
com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETPush.configureSDKWithAppIdAndClientIdAndClientSecret(String, String, String)
          Use ETPush.configureSDKWithAppIdAndAccessToken(String, String) instead.
